description: Try our easy to follow Pita Pizzas recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Pita Pizzas Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 tbs garlic, onion & herbs tomato paste
4 small wholemeal traditional Lebanese pita breads

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 240Â°C. Line 2 baking trays with baking paper.
Place pita breads on trays and spread with tomato paste. Sprinkle with ricotta and prosciutto. Bake for 5 minutes or until prosciutto is crisp. Top with rocket leaves and drizzle with oil to serve.
